article_title: Keeping Track Of The Overcriminalization Problem

article_metadata.description: Overcriminalization is a term that came into vogue about ten or so years ago as a catch-all phrase to describe several interrelated legal policy problems. Washington Legal Foundation (WLF) has been at the forefront of the debate on overcriminalization, helping to popularize the term and offering thought leadership to policymakers, [...]
article_metadata.author: Washington Legal Foundation
